name: RIOTOUS
description:
RIOTOUS Is a Third-Person Shooter supporting cross platform play, players battle on 32 player maps in a variety of environments and settings.
Choose your weapon, choose your options, and fight the battle against the Zombie Infected mutants or play as the Infected. Matches are 150 Points or 15 Minutes in length and players can play Online with Bots, Friends, and Strangers, or play Offline with Bots or by LAN Connection.

Play Alone, With Friends, Or Make New Friends. RIOTOUS Integrates into your existing friends networks seamlessly including Steam and RIOTOUS Online.
RIOTOUS Includes No Pay-to-Progress or other Micro-transactions offering every gamer an equal opportunity to enjoy the game.

Prepare to RIOT and enjoy RIOTOUS.
